caption.p: Topological features of the non-functioning pituitary adenoma progression-related lncRNA-mRNA network. (A) Relation of dysregulated lncRNAs coexpressed with dysregulated mRNAs visualized by a Circos plot. (B) Degree distributions of the network; all degrees followed a power-law distribution. (C) Average path length distributions of the real network and 1,000 random networks. lnc, long non-coding.
